name: Zombie Town - Defense Sniper
description:
is an FPS (First Person Shooting) and Virtual Reality based 3D game with full of Action and Thrill. Multiple fabulous levels and opportunity is available to test and enhance your shooting skills without performing any Realistic Violation
First person 3D Zombie shooting game
Thrilling levels of attack on Zombies and their responsive attack on you
Stunning graphics with heavy arsenal and military weaponry system
Scary and effective soundtrack and realistic physics
Tuned for a gun strike defense pattern
Stunning HD graphics
